text: O you who believe the idolaters are indeed unclean they are filth on account of their inner vileness so do not let them come near the Sacred Mosque that is let them not enter the Sanctuary after this year of theirs year 9 of the Hijra. If you fear impoverishment poverty as a result of the cessation of their commerce with you God will surely enrich you from His bounty if He will and He indeed enriched them through conquests and the imposition of the jizya. God is Knowing Wise.
